d:entry.d:title: Dictionary application
d:entry.p: An application to look up dictionary on Mac OS X.
d:entry.span: The Dictionary application first appeared in Tiger.
It's application icon looks like below.

d:entry.p: A core protocol of the Internet protocol suite. It originated in the initial network implementation in which it complemented the Internet Protocol (IP). Therefore, the entire suite is commonly referred to as TCP/IP.

An application protocol for distributed, collaborative, hypermedia information systems. HTTP is the foundation of data communication for the World Wide Web. Hypertext is structured text that uses logical links (hyperlinks) between nodes containing text.
